queries.query: tiny fey creature that can turn invisible and communicate with animals
queries.variant: small fey being that can go invisible and talk to beasts

queries.query: magical tiny creature with high dexterity and exceptional agility
queries.variant: small magical being with excellent agility and high dexterous skills

queries.query: small fey with magic resistance and abilities to mend or clean
queries.variant: tiny fey with resistance to magic and skills to repair or clean

queries.query: nimbly agile fey with decent hit points and spell resistance
queries.variant: quick and agile fey creature with good hit points and magic resistance

queries.query: creature with low strength but excellent at avoiding attacks using magic
queries.variant: being with poor strength yet great at dodging hits through magic
